lead_paragraph: An insurance group has been systematically and improperly cutting the hours of home care for their disabled clients, according to a report by a coalition of more than 100 nonprofit groups.

headline.print_headline: Companies Improperly Cut Home-Care Hours for Disabled Clients, Report Says
headline.main: Lives Upended by Disputed Cuts in Home-Health Care for Disabled Patients

snippet: An insurance group has been systematically and improperly cutting the hours of home care for their disabled clients, according to a report by a coalition of more than 100 nonprofit groups....
abstract: Study conducted by coalition of nonprofit groups shows that managed care organization Senior Health Partners has regularly cut home-care hours for disabled clients who qualify under Medicaid; report confirms allegations made in federal class-action lawsuit against organization on behalf of aged and disabled clients threatened with cuts to their health care.
